custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is viewing the TMM
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 
* hero image
* short description
* divider line
* team names, day, date, time and location on the  left
* teams logos on the right
* 'Buy Tickets' cta

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the hero image
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN hero image should not be linked

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the section below the hero image
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the section should not be linked

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on 'Buy Tickets' cta
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to tdc

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's device is set to light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN ticketing module has a light mode design

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's device is set to dark mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN ticketing module has a dark mode design

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user sees TMM 
AND TMM is based on user's favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN hero image displays user's favorite team's star player

Team action shot

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user sees TMM 
AND TMM is based on followed player in town
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN hero image displays followed player image

title: Hero image - good weather in town

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user sees TMM 
AND TMM is based on good weather
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN hero image display stadium image of the city user resides in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user sees TMM based of favorite team in town
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN short description has a favorite team logo and the copy talks about user's favorite team coming to town

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user sees TMM based of followed player in town
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN short description has a favorite team logo and the copy talks about user's followed player coming to town

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user sees tMM based on weather
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN short description has weather logo (sun) and the copy talks about weather in the town user resides in

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Game data in TMM
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user sees:
* team names as a headline
* day (ddd format), date, time, time zone and location on the left
* teams logos on the right

title: Time Zone
custom_expected: Always depends on the time zone where the stadium is, not where user is

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is in EDT zone
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN time in game data is displayed in the Time Zone where user's phone is registered

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is in CDT zone
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN time in game data is displayed in the Time Zone where user's phone is registered

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is in MDT zone
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN time in game data is displayed in the Time Zone where user's phone is registered

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is in MST zone
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN time in game data is displayed in the Time Zone where user's phone is registered

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is in PDT zone
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN time in game data is displayed in the Time Zone where user's phone is registered

title: Military Time
custom_steps: WHEN user's phone time is set to military
custom_expected: THEN TMM time is displayed in am/pm format. This is coming from StatsAPI

title: One TMM display
custom_expected:
A fan should only see one module on the Home surface

Priority of TMM is TBD

Design and display inputs could differ (e.g. see the Favorite Team treatment on day X and the Good Weather treatment on day Y).

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's favorite team is coming to the town user resides in
AND user's followed player is also coming to town
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees only one module on the Home surface

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's favorite team is coming to the town user resides in
AND the weather looks good
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees only one module on the Home surface

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's followed player is also coming to town 
AND the weather looks good
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees only one module on the Home surface

title: NON logged in user
custom_expected: THEN user does NOT see TMM

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN users favorite team is LAA (or any team that uses TDC)
AND this team comes to Denver (or city of NYY, SEA, ARI, COL, CWS, ATL, TOR, SD)
AND user resides in Denver
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user DO NOT see the TMM

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's followed player is in Denver (or city of NYY, SEA, ARI, COL, CWS, ATL, TOR, SD)
AND user resides in Denver
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user DO NOT see the TMM

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN weather is good in Denver (or city of NYY, SEA, ARI, COL, CWS, ATL, TOR, SD)
AND user resides in Denver
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user DO NOT see the TMM

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's favorite team is set to Cardinals and user is in LA
AND Cardinals are coming to LA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the TMM

custom_steps_separated.content: WHE user updates the favorite team to Dodgers
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should not see the TMM

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user updates the favorite team to Rockies
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should not see the TMM

title: TMM for cancelled and postponed games

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user receives the TMM
AND the game status changes to cancelled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN TMM disappears immediately after game status got changed

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user receives the TMM
AND the game status changes to postponed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN TMM disappears immediately after game status got changed

title: CTA - TDC login
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is logged in in TDC using the same credentials as mlb.com

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user sees TMM 
AND user did not click on 'Buy Tickets' CTA before
AND user clicks on 'Buy Tickets' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with a login screen 
where user needs to enter first and last name

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user sees TMM 
AND user clicked on 'Buy Tickets' CTA before
AND user clicks on 'Buy Tickets' CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is NOT displayed with a login screen

title: TMM designs
custom_expected:
TMM is configurable and have several designs 
https://www.figma.com/design/zzcIJn8mD4cLVmE7RwsUAN/Ticketing-Module?node-id=1067-25880&t=YaB4pfclzRL8LWys-0
AND each design should have 'Buy Tickets' CTA, game date, location and coming team name

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on series CTA link
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN link is opened in webview
AND all games are displayed in the list
AND user can pick the game user wants to purchase tickets for

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user the TMM for series
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN TMM should display  dates of 3 (maybe 4) upcoming games

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN first game has been played
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN TMM still displayed all dates of the series

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN there are only 2 games left in series
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN TMM still displayed all dates of the series

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN there is only one games left in series
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN TMM still displayed all dates of the series

title: User changes location while seeing TMM

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN users sees TMM
AND then user's phone location changes
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN TMM is appear based on registered phone location (coming from machine learning team, DMA) and phones current location will not have an impact

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN users sees TMM
AND then user updates the location (time zone)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN TMM appear logic does not change

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user scrolls down on the home screen
AND user meets the TMM logic criteria
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees TMM

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the TMM
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees team logo, date and CTA

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to TDC

title: Stress test
custom_expected: Show / No show - Services team use either local machine or blaze meter to test it

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user spam clicks on CTA button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN CTA does not break
AND user is not able to spam click it

title: Spanish version
custom_preconds: GIVEN user's phone language is set to spanish
custom_expected: THEN TMM is displayed in spanish

title: TMM loader
custom_preconds: WHEN user has bad internet connection

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's phone is set to light mode
AND user is viewing TMM
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the TMM loader has a light background

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's phone is set to dark mode
AND user is viewing TMM
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the TMM loader has a dark background

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN TMM is down
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user id displayed with error view

* 'OOF! We dropped the ball!' title
* 'We are sorry, but this module has an error.
Please try refreshing and if the problem persists, contact Customer Support.'
* CTA 'Refresh'

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user tabs 'Refresh'
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN page refreshes

title: User Dismissal
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is shown a TMM

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user dismiss the module
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user should not see the TMM for the same campaign again

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user quits the app
AND opens the app again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THE TMM is not displayed

title: Muting any TMM campaign after dismissal
custom_preconds: GIVEN user previously dismissed the TMM

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user is on the home tab
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user does not see any other campaign for X  configurable number of hours

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user reopens the app within those X number of hours
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user does not see any campaign

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN X hours passed
AND user opens the app again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user displayed with a campaign (if available)

title: TMM display after user purchased a ticket via TMM
custom_preconds: GIVEN a list of games being promoted

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user buys a ticket via the TMM
AND returns to the Home Surface
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the TMM should no longer show

title: TMM display after user purchased a ticket NOT via TMM
custom_preconds: GIVEN a list of games being promoted

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user has tickets to at least one of the games
(user purchased ticket at ticket.com without clicking on TMM)
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user still sees that campaign

title: TMM display using several devices
custom_preconds: GIVEN user dismissed the TMM on device 1

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens Home surface on device 2
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the TMM is not displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens Home surface on device 1
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the TMM is not displayed

title: Tampa Bay Rays ballpark - bad weather

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the weather is bad in Tampa
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user still gets a TMM since the Tampa Bay Rays ballpark is Dome

title: Good weather; fav team is in market

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN favorite team is in market
AND weather is sunny and clear
Ex Mets fan living in New York
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the TMM should be displayed

title: Good weather; fav team is out of market

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN favorite team is out of market
AND weather is sunny and clear
Ex Dodgers fan living in New York
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the TMM should NOT be displayed

title: Mets and Yankees
custom_expected: Location and user's favorite team logic should be combined for some cases

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is Yankee's fan 
AND user lives closer to Mets ballpark
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the TMM for Yankees only and not the Mets

title: Followed player is out of market; user logged in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has a followed player visiting the town the user resides in city  which domestic club uses TDC
AND user is logged in

Ex A Shohei Ohtani fan lives in New York and the Dodgers are in town to play the Mets and/or Yankees
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user sees TMM

custom_steps_separated.content:
2nd example:
Mets fan living in LA.
The Mets are playing the Dodgers in LA.

title: Followed player is out of market; user NOT logged in

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user has a followed player visiting the town the user resides in city  which domestic club uses TDC
AND user is NOT logged in

Ex A Shohei Ohtani fan lives in New York and the Dodgers are in town to play the Mets and/or Yankees
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user DOES NOT see TMM

custom_steps_separated.content:
2nd example:
Mets fan living in LA.
The Mets are playing the Dodgers in LA.

WHEN user has a followed player in market
AND this player get injured and does not play
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN TBD

title: Voice Over
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a voice over setting on

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the images/logos
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN voice over reads the alt text of the images and logos

Example: “Bryce Harper of the Philadelphia Phillies.”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the headline
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN voice over reads the headline

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on matchup section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN team matchup reads together
AND date is announced together in formal 'Month date'. Ex (“August Fifth, August Sixth, August Seventh”).

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on team logos
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN both logos read together

Example: “Logos for the Philadelphia Phillies and the Los Angeles Dodgers.”

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on CTA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN voice over reads CTA as 'Buy [awayTeam] At [homeTeam] Tickets' format
AND the frontend button text still displays "Buy Tickets"

title: Accessibility - font size

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN there is no visual defects and all UI looks good

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's phone setting is set to light mode
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN there is no visual defects and all UI looks good
